H0.text: Which town in southeast Wales became a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2000. Cardiff

H1.text: Which town in southeast Wales became a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2000. Newport

H2.text: Which town in southeast Wales became a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2000. Caerphilly

H3.text: Which town in southeast Wales became a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2000. Blaenavon

A4.text: Blaenavon Industrial Landscape, in and around Blaenavon, Torfaen, Wales, was inscribed a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 2000.

A5.text: The Blaenavon Ironworks was a major centre of iron production using locally mined or quarried iron ore, coal and limestone.
